page.title: 14CARAVAN LIFE AT CLAYTON PARK
page.content: Mrs. Annie Bain, a senior citizen, lives in a 36ft long caravan. Her living room is fairly small, a bit draughty at times, but generally cosy. Her kitchen is reasonably equipped and has a calor gas cooker. There is a small bedroom,like a ship's cabin and a small bathroom. At the end of the caravan is the master bedroom,which can hold a double bed. All switches are operated by cords.The fire is fuelled by anthracite.Each mobile home owned by its resident,stands on rented land.Unfortunately,there isn't much excitement for children as most residents are retired and they like to sit back and watch T.V. A mobile library calls at Clayton every two weeks.Residents enjoy lots of open countryside -in spite of limited space within.
